files.patch:
@@ -414,0 +414,7 @@ +

To include JCov coverage for just a subset of all modules, you can +use the --with-jcov-modules arguments to +configure, e.g. +--with-jcov-modules=jdk.compiler,java.desktop.

+

For more fine-grained control, you can pass arbitrary filters to JCov +using --with-jcov-filters, and you can specify a specific +JDK to instrument using --with-jcov-input-jdk.

@@ -348,0 +348,8 @@
+To include JCov coverage for just a subset of all modules, you can use the
+`--with-jcov-modules` arguments to `configure`, e.g.
+`--with-jcov-modules=jdk.compiler,java.desktop`.
+
+For more fine-grained control, you can pass arbitrary filters to JCov using
+`--with-jcov-filters`, and you can specify a specific JDK to instrument
+using `--with-jcov-input-jdk`.
+

@@ -2,1 +2,1 @@
